website_summaries.verdict: Wine aficionados wanting top-quality glasses without paying Best of the Best prices should check out this favored set.
pros: Set offers 2 different sizes for both white and red wines
Comes with set of 12 for larger parties and gatherings
Red cups hold almost 16.75 ounces of wine, white cups hold 17 ounces
cons: A few buyers claimed that the glasses arrived with uneven bases

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems to be declining on this product (or i recently received a defective set)
customer_reviews.text: I've placed 3 orders now for these glasses, and they are a staple in my home. This most recent purchase, however, leaves a bit to be desired. The bottoms of many of the new glasses are uneven, so they do not sit flatly on a table. Thus, they are constantly rocking back and forth with even the slightest vibration of the surface they are sitting on which is, honestly, kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: dudewhobuysalottastuffonamazon

customer_reviews.title: Way more difficult to tip over, saving wine, lives
customer_reviews.text: The last thing I need when I'm drinking five bottles of wine in a night is something like a stem getting in my way. These are harder to tip over and allow for way less wine to potentially spill onto my floor rather than in my mouth. Also you can hold them like a real adult instead of holding them the way i envision the monopoly guy holds his wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and packaged safely, but quality is so-so ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged safely, but quality is so-so. One of the glasses has a flaw right around the ring making it uncomfortable to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: These are PERFECT and I still think they are nice enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have high end wine glasses but wanted something for everyday use that can go in the dishwasher and not worry about getting broken or having to hand wash each time. These are PERFECT and I still think they are nice enough to have with guests over. The fine crystal glasses are nice but not for regular use. These are great quality, highly recommend and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: great value priced wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Needed some wine glasses for the holidays and didn't want to spend a fortune so found these on amazon and took a chance. I have to say I was pleasantly surprised by the look and feel of the glasses. The set comes with both wide mouth and a more normal sized taller narrower glasses. We prefer the taller more narrow glasses but both are good and now we have enough for guests without using several different style glasses. I would buy these again and might see if I can order 4 more of the more narrow ones so I have 10 of those.
customer_reviews.author: shelly k.

customer_reviews.title: Wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wine glasses for everyday use. They were priced very well and look exactly as pictured. Unfortunately they aren’t as durable as we would have liked, we have already broken three when washing them. Our previous glasses went through the same treatment and lasted for years without cracking. I would recommend these as additional glasses for parties or if they are going to be used rarely but not for your “everyday” glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. They break so easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have ONE glass left. A couple broke in the dishwasher, so we started washing them by hand and one by one, even though we were careful, they all cracked. They've all broken. These aren't durable at all. I've never even dropped one, but they just seem to develop random cracks. Touch two glasses together, lightly, and one will break. Super irritated, because these were supposed to be decent glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Movieluver

customer_reviews.title: Well Priced; Versatile; Easy to store; Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stemless wine/cocktail glasses. The shorter ones are difficult for small hands, however, no problem for my husband who enjoys them for martinis, manhattans, etc. The smaller bottom on the larger glasses make them perfect for me for any beverage. No imperfections in any glasses, and they were well packed, arriving undamaged. Good price! The stemless glasses are more versatile for cocktails and storage and encourage fewer mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Egan

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday glassware!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for these glasses! Needed something that I could use as a water glass, a wine glass, fruit parfait, ice cream, etc. All this works and more! The glasses are simple and sturdy and the glass is thick so it makes me feel confident when placing hot or cold items in them. They are dishwasher safe and really tend to be use for all sorts of purposes. The price is right and the shipping was simple without any issues! May get another set to gift!
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: We love our stemless wine glasses! They really look cool and I prefer them over regular wine glasses because I don't have to wash and dry them by hand; I can just put them in the dishwasher and so far, they come out nice and clean. Also, this company is doing such a great job in packaging them so that they arrive in perfect condition. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nat L

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in time for Thanksgiving and love love love them. Good quality glass. I don't feel like they'll break super easily. The stemless feature is great for the dishwasher and storing. I use them for wine and cocktails. They look pretty with colored drinks and garnish. Great set of glasses at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Remtulla

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has a brown streak :(
customer_reviews.text: A little disappoitned. Some of the glasses have a brown streak on them. At first i thought it was dirt from the box they came in but after washing them the brown streak is still there. Gave it 2 stars because they look like what’s advertised, minus the brown streak. (Pic attached)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12 piece stemless wine glass set and 4 out of the 12 glasses I recieved have strange raised bits of glass embedded at the bottom of the inside of the glass. It looks almost like broken bits of glass got stuck to the bottom of the inside of the wine glass inside. I am afraid to use these in case these pieces of glass break free and get into the liquid someone is drinking. Had some of the glasses not arrived this way this would have been a great set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain and durable material for everyday wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these to have extra wine glasses on hand and I'm impressed with them. They are a little thicker glass than we are used to for wine glasses but this will likely make them more durable for daily use. These are a great alternative to using our high-end hand wash only glasses each day. For the price, it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mere Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & can be use to serve dessert or drinks. comes in safe box.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected, I like to very much. The glasses came in very good condition they weren't broken and packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Finally went stemless - what a relief
customer_reviews.text: I love holding a stemmed wineglass. We broke a lot of them, tough clean-ups every one. These stemless glasses have a nice feel in the hand, and there's enough of a base so that your hand isn't warming your white wine. They also take up less space on shelves, giving us lots more shelf footage. Plus, if they do break, they're not "precious". Easy to replace. Good for long parties when people are changing wines and want a fresh glass.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as I was going to be hosting a crowd for Thanksgiving and realized most of my stemmed wine glasses had broken over the past few years. The glasses arrived in perfect condition, and I love how much more stable they are than stemmed glasses. No spilled drinks! They also go right into the dishwasher for easy clean-up, and they're versatile for other drinks, too (water, mixed drinks, whatever.) We've been very happy with this purchase and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Every Day Use
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for stemless wine glasses for every day use and came across the Libbey Vina. I love that it has 6 red glass and 6 white glasses - the price is unbeatable. The red glass is a little larger than expected - some reviewers find it almost awkward. I agree that it's a touch big but it doesn't botther me at all. It cleans really well and I love that it's dishwasher safe. It is breakable but it's not as flimsy as some other models. Great for having a casual get together or glass at home but I'd probably bring out the better, stemmed glasses for celebratory dinners. Overall - I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bex Terefe

customer_reviews.title: Good value for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses just arrived. Though not yet used, I believe these will be great every day, casual glasses. That said, I would not hesitate to use them in a more formal setting. My only complaint was one red wine glass arrived cracked (out of three sets). I am not going to bother with trying to replace it as we really have more than sufficient for our needs! And a shout-out to Amazon delivery. Our delivery guy was careful and ensured that the packages were tucked away, well out of sight! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Clohossey

customer_reviews.title: Functional but low quality
customer_reviews.text: The white wine glasses look good. The red wine glasses however are obviously made to low quality standards. There are bumps projecting upward on the ring around the lip of all six of the red wine glasses that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses this week, and I can't get over how nice they are for the price! They are solid quality, easy to hold, dishwasher-safe, and I love the way they show off my wines' fragrances, colors, and tastes. These are a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: maisoui11

customer_reviews.title: Three years later.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses seem very nice and stable and hold more than enough quantities. I have to say that over the last 3 years, five of the glasses have developed star shaped cracks near the top thus eliminating their usage. To be fair I have used the dishwasher to clean them and it seems putting ICE in them is a factor in developing the cracks. Hence regular inspection of these glasses is needed to look out for cracks.
customer_reviews.author: PONTEVECCHIO

customer_reviews.title: I use them for everything!

customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased

I hand wash them and have had them for a couple months and haven't broken one yet. I also got the champagne flutes and am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Powers

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated gift

customer_reviews.author: Suedehead

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!

customer_reviews.author: Laura79

customer_reviews.title: These were good quality and we really enjoy them

Not a single one was damaged when they arrived in the mail. I would recommend and definitely buy again.

I just got tired of breaking the nice glasses. I have even dropped these on the wood floor and on the stainless countertops and they do not break. They look great.

customer_reviews.author: aarghj

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal

customer_reviews.title: Received them very fast, nothing is broken, good size.

customer_reviews.title: Quality wine glasses

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were exactly what I expected. For the ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were exactly what I expected. For the same price, most sets come with 4 of one type of glass, but this set has six of the red and six of the white. They are gorgeous and work perfectly. Will definitely buy again, as I'm sure I'll break a few at some point.

customer_reviews.author: Michelle O.

customer_reviews.title: carefully check for defects!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a really good value for Libbey glassware. These are more sturdy than thinner, more expensive brands. However I was disappointed to find a manufacturing defect in one glass after the return period closed. One of the red glasses has a very sharp defect on the edge that makes it hazardous to drink from so I must dispose of this one defective glass. If you order this set I would advise you to carefully check the glasses for defects so you can take advantage of the return period if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Quality glasses for a great price!

I loved the two versions for red and white wine. They're strong glass so I am not super fearful of them breaking or chipping. They hold up in the dishwasher well, too.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses!!

product_meta.title: Libbey Stemless 12-Piece Wine Glass Party Set for Red and White Wines
product_meta.description:
Color:Clear| Style Name:Set

Perfect for casual dining and entertaining, Libbey's combo set of 12 stemless wine glasses feature a sophisticated, upscale curved design that feels comfortable to hold. Durable and chip resistant, these red wine and white wine glasses provide an instant, effortless upgrade to your drinkware collection. This set includes six 16.75-ounce red wine glasses and six 17-ounce white wine glasses. 

Offering more than just a trendy, modern design, Libbey's stemless wine glasses feature a wide bowl for the red wine glass and a slender profile for the white wine glass — each providing the perfect showcase for any varietal's flavors and aromas. 

They're a great match for any wine you plan on pouring, from Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Shiraz, and Zinfandel to Chardonnay, Riesling, Pinot Grigio, and Sauvignon Blanc. These versatile glasses can also be used for serving chilled water, cocktails, and more. Bring them home for yourself, or present as a gift at weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, or any celebration.

Both glasses feature a stable, ergonomic, and balanced base, which helps minimize the chance of tipping or breaking. And because of their stemless design, these glasses help save space in the cabinet. The red wine glass measures 3.875 inches tall and 3.875 inches round, and the white wine glass measures 4.5 inches tall and 3.5 inches round. Dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup. Made lead-free in the USA.

Celebrate This with Glassware from Libbey
If you’ve ever sipped from a glass, odds are you’ve already met Libbey. We rank as the top glassware manufacturer in the Americas and one of the largest tableware suppliers in the world. As the runaway leader, we are setting new standards for stability, strength, and growth opportunity. We believe every occasion — big and small — is an opportunity to celebrate life.
